name: No, Stop!
description:
Synopsis

A game where you play underwater hockey. Playing underwater hockey though means you need to stop (No, Stop! or No stopping) for oxygen. Sadly, we couldn't add the AI we planned, but if we get enough votes we will do a post jam version with the AI, extra polishing, improved graphics (and possibly some additional features i.e. special moves maybe...).

Also some of the sprites might appear to be cropped, this is just due to the way it was rendered in HTMLify.

Controls

P1 movement and menu selection: arrow keys, diving: " , ", hit button and to join game: "."

P2 movement and menu selection: WASD, diving: "1" , hit button and to join game: "2"

P3 movement and menu selection: UHJK, diving: "T" , hit button and to join game: "Y"

How to play
 Get the hockey pock into the opposite goal by dribbling (moving the pock by moving within a certain distance of it) and hitting the pock (using the hit button while moving).

If the clock on top of the player is shaking your oxygen is about to run out. If the oxygen does run out, you will be stopped and you will be floated to the surface  and will be stopped until air is regained (which is why you need to release the "dive button" at appropriate intervals).

Credits

Programming and Art: Takago, Miyaki, Anonymous

Music: MacLeod, Kevin - Funkorama (We speeded it up), transitking - Water Waves
